code: import{coins}from"../../config";export function formatAddress(wallet){return ellideMiddle(wallet,24);}export function ellideMiddle(str,maxOutLen){if(str.length<=maxOutLen){return str;}var ellide="â€¦";var frontLen=Math.ceil((maxOutLen-ellide.length)/2);var tailLen=Math.floor((maxOutLen-ellide.length)/2);return str.slice(0,frontLen)+ellide+str.slice(str.length-tailLen,str.length);}export function getTokenConfig(denom){return coins.find(function(c){return c.denom===denom;});}export function formatPrice(price){var coin=getTokenConfig(price.denom);var amount=parseInt(price.amount)/Math.pow(10,coin.decimals);return amount+" "+coin.name;}export function toMinDenom(amount,denom){var coin=getTokenConfig(denom);return Math.ceil(amount*Math.pow(10,coin.decimals)).toString();}
